Thank you Sir My answer for that number 4(b) is 2674Hz, am I correct please?

Yes. In that case, f=f_0*(v+v_o)/(v+v_s) where v is the speed of sound, v_o is the speed of the observer and v_s is the speed of the source. Think of it like that: source is trying to decrease the frequency (hence a + in the denominator) whilst observer wants to increase it (hence the + in the numerator)
